msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hmm Not the typical choice for lawn furniture, is it?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Looks like custom work too. Tell me, who around here would customize ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, check it out. Who left here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe this is an art project of some kind. What do you think the message is, ?
There are two kinds of folks in the world.<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Those who will sleep in a random , and those who won't. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Guess which kind I am!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Who decides what channel gets played on a public TV?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It has to be something appropriate for all ages that everyone wants to watch. You knowlike my livestream!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yo! We could have a pop-up club anywhere we wanted with ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Crank up the and we'll have a dance-off. Ha HA!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />OK, it's : Why am I sweating?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't have anywhere to be, but the is stressing me out!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />AhhI feel more relaxed just looking at .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you think it feels more fashionable just looking at me? Ha HA!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Imagine taking a bath out here<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It'd be fabulous!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />How ingenious! Now I can sit down and work on my screenplay anytime!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What's it about? Oh, just the usual A handsome, loner, superhero detective who saves the world. It's semi-autobiographical.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Now this is a great idea. You can just take a load off any old time with . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wonder what kind soul left it out for us Whoever it was, my legs thank you!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Check out the free-range . Yes!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I could shred an insane solo on it right now if I wanted tobut I don't feel like it.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yo, it looks like someone's setting up shop out here with
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm known to whip up some mean from time to time, you know.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't know if I'd want to work out in public on random . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />No one needs to see the face I make when I sweat.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, who's throwing the party with ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I assume my invite is forthcoming

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's not often you see used as a streetlight, but I'm a fan. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I know what you're thinking, and I'm right there with you, buddy, when I saynatural light is overrated.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, have you seen the out here? I'm shocked, ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now anyone and everyone can change their look whenever the mood strikes them. It's brilliant! Why didn't I think of it first?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I just love that there's
out here in the great outdoors. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You never know when you'll need a quick outfit change for a last-minute casting call, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Aww, why is that poor thing cooped up out here? Talking about the there. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Eh, who am I to judge. Maybe it likes being in there. I'd live in a shoebox if it had good Wi-Fi, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, there's something you don't see every day randomly placed in a tank. !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wonder what it thinks of our island. It must feel like an astronaut in a spaceship That makes me an alien!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, look at that. Someone left here!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If only this magnificent creature had known it would still be prowling the land after millions of years

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />See? This is what I love about . Randomly finding !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm only an amateur art critic, but seeing this outside really evolves my interpretation,

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm glad to see someone is starting to take exterior decor seriously with this .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think the whole world should be like a museum—filled with great art and designer clothes.Waitam I confusing the words "museum" and "mall" again?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Look! Someone left a fancy piece of art here. Ooh, it's like we're part of the art installation<20_3 arg="3" />Actuallysomething's off.<20_3 arg="6" /> It's like pre-ripped designer jeans with the rips in TOTALLY the wrong spots

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Huh. I don't really understand why there would need to be here<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Wait. Is this the source of our lovely island breezes? Is this whole island fake? Just one big movie set?!That's SO COOL!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />From the deep sea to a cozy spot on the surface of our island It's !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />, living here on is like my fave reality show Unpredictable!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh. Oh, . I'm so happy to see this here!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's one of my headshots! I've always wanted to find one in the wild!Waityou don't think a casting director just, like, abandoned it here, do you?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, nostalgia overload. Look at !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wish I had saved all of my old toys from when I was a kid. I'd be a Bellionaire by now!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, look. Someone left here!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is there a TV shoot going on or something? Maybe a reality show? I'm camera-ready! I'm camera-ready!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What's this? Looks like , huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, I'm all for "shabby chic," but this just feels like someone left something out by accident.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Isn't it unusual to find outside?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I guess this is island living, though. Anything goes, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, that's good thinking! An outdoor !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'll have to remember to stop by here whenever I need a quick warm- up on a chilly day.
